hero.subtitle: Developer
hero.description: Passionate about creating innovative and efficient technological solutions. With experience in web and backend development, I specialize in building modern applications that deliver an excellent user experience.

about.title: About Me
about.description:
I am Franco Ortiz Cabrera, a fullstack developer with experience in technologies such as Angular, Spring Boot, and Node.js. Graduated from Pontificia Universidad Católica de Valparaíso, I specialize in creating efficient and scalable applications, using both relational (MySQL) and non-relational (MongoDB) databases.

In my daily work, I use agile methodologies to ensure effective collaboration and the delivery of high-impact results.

I am passionate about continuous learning and contributing to innovative solutions, with a focus on improving user experience and optimizing technological processes. I seek opportunities that allow me to continue growing professionally in web and backend application development.

contact.title: Contact

contact.description: Do you have a project in mind or are you looking for a developer for your team? I'm available to collaborate on new challenges and opportunities. Feel free to contact me to discuss how we can work together.
